GisDirectPositionImpl Class Reference

#include <DirectPositionImpl.h>

Inherits GisIDirectPosition.

Inheritance diagram for GisDirectPositionImpl:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisDirectPositionImpl class is a default implementation of GisIDirectPosition. GisDirectPositionImpl implements accessors from GisIDirectPosition, matching mutators, and simple data members. Assignment and exact equality operators are also provided.
